channel.title: Aryan client keeps closing as soon as i open it
channel.description:
I apologise in advance if this is in the wrong place.
I have downloaded the Aryan Moparscape Client but when i try to open it it just keep closing on itself, i have downloaded Java SE Development Kit 6u18 I think it is and Winrar but it still doesn't open... can anybody help?
Edit: I havent used Moparscape in about 10 months and I have forgot everything i ever knew about this, hence why i'm asking a reasonably simple question, anyway, could you answer my question in noob language and go through, in detail, where I will find things ect.
Thank you :D
Please close, problem solved (Y)
